original_text: Do not let evil things win against you! Instead, do good things. Then you will win against the evil things that people do. Do not let evil things win against you! Instead, do good things. Then you will win against the evil things that people do.
korean_text: 악에게 지지 말고 선으로 악을 이기라

sentences.original_text: Do not let evil things win against you!
sentences.korean_translation: 악한 것이 너를 이기게 하지 마라!

sentences.original_text: Then you will win against the evil things
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너는 악한 것들을 이길 것이다

sentences.original_text: Do not let evil things win against you!
sentences.korean_translation: 악한 것이 너를 이기게 하지 마라!

sentences.original_text: Then you will win against the evil things
